closed_reason: Added --include-awaiting flag to tk ready command. Implemented ReadyIncludeAwaiting() in query package. Deprecated --include-manual flag with warning. Removed redundant manual filtering since Ready() now uses IsAwaitingHuman(). Added tests for both query and CLI.
description:
Update tk ready command to exclude awaiting ticks

Current behavior:
- Shows all ready tasks (not blocked)
- Has --include-manual flag to optionally show manual tasks

New behavior:
- Exclude awaiting ticks by default (like manual)
- Add --include-awaiting flag for optional display
- Consider renaming/generalizing to --include-human or similar

The tk ready command shows agent-workable tasks. Tasks awaiting human should not appear by default since they're not actionable by agent.

Implementation options:
1. Reuse Ready() which now excludes awaiting (simplest)
2. Add explicit filter in ready command
3. Add --include-awaiting flag for humans wanting to see all

Recommendation: Use Ready() and add --include-awaiting flag that bypasses the awaiting filter.
title: Update tk ready to exclude awaiting ticks
